detectors.description: ERC20Token.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xcf841ca09bf31ad0f37a139c948aab2480abcdea-ERC20Token.sol#481-485) uses a weak PRNG: screen (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xcf841ca09bf31ad0f37a139c948aab2480abcdea-ERC20Token.sol#484)

ERC20Token.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xcf841ca09bf31ad0f37a139c948aab2480abcdea-ERC20Token.sol#481-485) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: screen = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(now,msg.sender,yucatan))) % 100 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xcf841ca09bf31ad0f37a139c948aab2480abcdea-ERC20Token.sol#482)
